page.title: 03OLD COTTAGES IN THORNHILL.
page.content: Dawn lives in one of these cottages Rachael and Dawn went to interview {Mrs Rita Taylor}(one of our dinner ladies) who used to live there. In{Thornhill}a long time ago they didn't use electric lamps they used parafin lamps instead. They had outside toilets.Inside there was one bucket that you had to empty every day.Some of the cottages were knocked down and they were over{100 years old. Mrs Taylor was{1 month old}when she first moved there it was about{20 years}ago, when she moved out to{Redhills}in{Broad Town.}Mrs Taylor said{Thornhill}hasn't changed much but the houses are a lot better. In the houses are {4 {rooms, a kitchen, a dinning room, {and 2 bedrooms.}There were 5
